description: The PED3-U universal stand holder is our simple low cost entry level product that works with any bare device or a device with a case or skin including the iPhone 5, iPhone, iPod touch, Blackberry, Droid, Palm, Motorola, Smartphones and more. In portrait view or landscape the PED3-U is a fast and simple stand with protected over cupped holding fingers to accommodate any device while keeping it securely in the stand. Like no other stand (except our others), the heavy stable platform shape is made from one solid piece of steel in the USA. Keeping your cable where it belongs can be frustrating and this is important, that is why we used our Thought Out exclusive split back cable management design.SPECIFICIATIONS:2.0" minimum distance between holder fingers (50mm)55 viewing angleOver  lb. Grade A press formed steel (+230 grams)Vinyl protected 22 over cupped holding fingersAccepts any cable3.72" wide x 3.65" depth x 5.35" heightDome polyurethane bumper feetCOMPATIBILITY:iPhone, iPod touch, Palm, Blackberry, Droid, Motorola, HTC, Smartphones and more (too many to list).
title: Thought Out PED3-U - iPhone Stand, Android, Galaxy, etc (universal fit)
